sentences.sContent: The Bell Jar, an autobiographic novel written by Sylvia Plath, gives a sufficient expression to the essence of social life.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Bell Jar, an autobiographic novel written by Sylvia Plath, gives a sufficient expression to the essence of social life.
sentences.sCn: 《钟罩》虽然是美国自白派著名女诗人西尔维亚·普拉斯的自传体小说，但相当充分地反映了社会生活的本质。

sentences.sContent: The autobiographic novel, Out of Africa, is Isak Denisens most famous work, which has been adapted into an American film with the same title.
sentences.sContent_eng: The autobiographic novel, Out of Africa, is Isak Denisens most famous work, which has been adapted into an American film with the same title.
sentences.sCn: 自传体小说《走出非洲》是丹麦女作家伊萨克·迪内森最著名的一部作品，并被改编成同名美国电影。

words.tran: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的

trans.tranCn: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的
